content.description:
I like this better than direct for the fact that it adds three more steep moves and a more exciting top out than (direct). 

  Start the same as (Direct), hit the lip, and then to the right jug, all the same as per (direct). However once in the right jug, cross over and begin to traverse right across the nice low jugs at the low lip of the boulder until you come to the flat jugs to the far right near the close tree. Top out through the flat "jugs". The top out can be tricky until you figure it out.

So much fun, I only wish it were a few more moves... 

  Look under the small roof at the portion that is closest to the stream. 

  There will be a long rail with positive portions. This is the start. figure out what to do with the feet under the roof, Pull on, toss out to the slopey lip, and then to the right to the better jug. Follow another jug to the easy top.

This crazy block is across the creek from Cascadia. 

  Its perched up on a couple of other blocks and elevated to the point to where its underside roof is able be climbed. The front portion, closest to the stream is where you will find "Don't Go Chasing Waterfalls" (V4/5). Bring at least two pads to allow for a safe landing.
